long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension walks the user through where to read aloud in the part of the text on the screen where the reading pointer move along progressively with the part you have read loosing the color to highlight the portion and the new part to read next. The extension uses Chrome speech recognition to match the highlighted text and the recognized speech by the user. The user selects the part of block  by clicking a paragraph.
This extension make use of "Chrome speech recognition" where Google's privacy policy for the function applies.
